code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./pages.css";import{stripBasename}from"@remix-run/router";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RequestChemical(){const[chemical,setChemical]=useState("");const[formula,setFormula]=useState("");const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/chemical/request",{type:"add",chemical:{name:chemical,formula:formula}}).then(response=>{console.log("Data Submitted Successfuly",response.data);setChemical("");setFormula("");}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error Submitting Data",error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Request A Chemical"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"desc",children:"If we did not have a chemical that you were looking for, please input the name or formula, and we will update it ASAP"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"desc",children:["If you want it updated faster, send an email to ","",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"mailto:aadithrowacct@gmail.com?subject=Chemical%20Request",style:{textDecoration:"none",color:"blue"},children:"aadithrowacct@gmail.com"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"request",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:chemical,onChange:e=>setChemical(e.target.value),placeholder:"Chemical Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:formula,onChange:e=>setFormula(e.target.value),placeholder:"Chemical Formula"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});}export default RequestChemical;
